ygData.subject: Re: New Bard Quests! (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, here s one for you, yesterday at work an employee was fired.  I was finishing reading this list at the time and eager to get home to play.  Time was
ygData.messageBody:
Well, here's one for you, yesterday at work an
employee was fired. I was finishing reading this list
at the time and eager to get home to play. Time was
4:30. 4:45 said employee was in the parking lot with
a 9mm threatning to kill our HR director. 4:55 SWAT
Team arrives. 5:00 I walk out to my car and go home
anyway, no damn sniper is going to keep me from cazic
tonite. :P Anyway, I think I was pretty safe, anymore
than a hundred yards and a 9 is pretty inaccurate,
right? Besides, I think he had a low 1hd missle stat.


--- Ryan Honeyman <slasher@...> wrote:
> >Well, at least your not bitter
>
> LOL
>
> Cheer me up! <eg>
>
> Maybe it's because I read the list at work. I
> should read it
> when I'm home with a frosty brew in my hand.
>
> Harmonic Distortion, 38th unchained melody.
> League of Antonican Bards, The Wind Spirit's Song
> < Keepers of Norrath > Innoruuk


=====
